pageProduct.name: Scholl Dry Skin PediMask 1 Pair
pageProduct.description:
Information

Foot care is only as good as the finishing touch

Discover the ExpertCare Dry Skin PediMask™ from Scholl to top off your foot care routine. It helps the cream to stay in place during the treatment, to provide you with an intense feeling of dourishment. The PediMask™ gives your feet what they need and is a great finishing touch to your foot care routine, leaving you with a long-lasting feeling of hydration.

Hydro'Retor Technology

The sock is lined with a mesh that is designed to hold the cream in place, to help maximise the amount of cream that can be absorbed by your skin in only 20 minutes.

20 Minute Thorough Treatment

One treatment takes 20 minutes. Just put the sock on and let the cream work for you.

No Mess

Thanks to the double layer design of the sock, the cream stays on the inside and you have a no mess experience on the outside. The sealing sticker of the opening helps secure the sock around your ankle.

Nourishing ingredients

Nourishing ingredients like glycerin, urea, shea butter and macadamia oil help provide a feeling of intense hydration after just one application.

Step 1

Begin by cleaning and drying your feet.

Step 2

Simply apply each sock to clean, dry feet, securing the sock in place with the attached sticker.

Step 3

Leave the mask on your feet for 20 minutes for best results

Step 4

Remove the sock and massage in any remaining product

General Information

Scholl PediMask Dry Skin provides intense feeling of nourishment for soft & smooth feet.

The experts at Scholl are brining you a mask designed specifically to moisturise the dry skin on your feet. Soft & Smooth feet in only 20 minutes .Provides intense feeling of nourishment .Provides long-lasting (8 hours) feeling of hydration . Easy to use, non-greasy

Boxed Contents: 1 pair foot sock mask

Size: Single pack

KEY FEATURES

• Soft & Smooth feet in only 20 minutes
• Provides intense feeling of nourishment
• Provides long-lasting (8 hours) feeling of hydration
• Easy to use, non-greasy

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. If irritation occurs stop use immediately. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Store in cool, dry place. Do not walk around when wearing the moisturising sock as it may cause you to slip or fall over.

Ingredients

Contains: Aqua, Glycerin, Urea, Hydrogenatd Polyisobutene, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, PEG-100 Stearate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Ceteareth-25, Macadamia Temifolia Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cetyle Alcohol, Chlorphenesin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Allantoin, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, BHT, Parfum, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Lactic Acid Algin, Sodium Citrate, Atelocollagen, Serine, Methylparaben, Citric Acid

Directions

1. Remove the foot masks from the pouch. 2. Carefully cut open each mask along the seal at the top of the sock. 3. Simply apply each sock to clean, dry feet, securing the sock in place with the attached sticker. 4. Remove the sock after 20 minutes and massage in any remaining product.

USAGE ADVICE

Keep out of reach of children. If irritation occurs stop use immediately. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Store in cool, dry place. Do not walk around when wearing the moisturising sock as it may cause you to slip or fall over.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 4 PELD or LDPE
